title: Our Mission
content: Feast Together helps you transform the ingredients you already have at home into delicious meals. We want to reduce food waste, promote home cooking, and bring joy to your kitchen through intelligent recipe suggestions and fun visuals.

title: Our Vision
content: To empower individuals—especially students and busy professionals—to cook creatively with what they have, save money, and discover the satisfaction of preparing meals from scratch.

title: Core Values
content:
• Simplicity: Easy-to-use and intuitive design
  • Sustainability: Reduce waste, save ingredients
  • Creativity: Discover new meals and cooking ideas
  • Fun: GIFs and visuals make cooking entertaining

title: Technologies Used
content:
• HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+
  • Spoonacular API for recipe suggestions
  • GIPHY API for fun and engaging visuals
  • Responsive design principles (mobile-first)
  • LocalStorage for favorites

title: The Creator
content:
Hi! I'm the developer behind Feast Together. This project was built as a final assignment for the WDD 330 course. I’m passionate about solving real-life problems through code and making tools that are both useful and enjoyable to use.

You can check out my work on GitHub or contact me here.

title: Sustainability Initiatives
content: We partner with local organizations to promote sustainable cooking habits and reduce food waste in communities. Join us in making a positive environmental impact.

title: User Testimonials
content:
• "Feast Together has changed how I cook! I never waste ingredients anymore." - Maria
  • "The recipe suggestions are spot on and the visuals make cooking fun." - John

title: Future Plans
content: We plan to integrate voice control, add more APIs for diverse recipes, and build a community forum to share tips and ideas.
